data: Hm. Weird outfit.{break}You must be the new alchemist.{break}I'm Gaiana. I work in the conservatory.{break}If you don't mind, I have somewhere I need to be.
So, uh...{break}I noticed that you never say anything.{break}I mean, you just... sit there.{break}And listen.{break}...{break}And stare.{break}Don't you ever have anything to say?
Sure, I have nothing else to do.{break}I'll be there at 20:00. Don't be late.

...You should talk more, then.{break}If you think things, you should try saying them out loud.{break}{mood:default}Otherwise it's just unnerving.{break}I obviously think you've got SOMETHING interesting about you.{break}I wouldn't have said yes to the date otherwise.{break}...{break}...See, you've gone silent again.{break}I think I'm just going to go home.{break}This was... a weird date.

Listen, I don't want to be mean, but...{break}I don't want to date people who have nothing to say.{break}And I think you're more interesting than that.{break}Or I wouldn't have said yes.{break}So maybe, I don't know, try it next time.{break}See ya.
Oh, I love these plants.{break}{mood:like}They're hard to find, and hard to grow, but so beautiful, don't you think?
{mood:dislike}Cool, so... this date is just me talking to myself, then.{break}No thanks. I think I'll head home.
{mood:happy}Thanks. I can use this for work.
Do you just go around giving things to people?{break}Thanks, I guess.

...{break}...{break}Listen...{break}I realise I might have made you a bit nervous last time we were here.{break}Well, I didn't really "realise".{break}Lina chewed me out when I told her how it went.{break}{mood:sad}I'm sorry. I know I can be kinda...
{mood:dislike}I don't really want this.{break}Fish are really gross.
{mood:dislike}Did you catch this? The poor thing.{break}This is a cruel joke.
{mood:angry}Do you think it's funny to stand people up?{break}{mood:dislike}You wasted my time. Thanks a lot.

{mood:laugh}Ha, yeah, I guess that's it.{break}{mood:default}I've always been like this. It drives a lot of people off.{break}The ones who stick around, even after getting to know me...{break}{npc:up}They're the real ones.{break}{npc:left}{mood:like}I'm not trying to test you, I promise.{break}I think I'm gonna call it a night, but this time... {break}Maybe you could walk me home or whatever. If you insist.

{mood:happy}I'm scary? Really? Ha.{break}{mood:default}It's not my intention. Honestly.{break}I'm just like this, I guess. But it's less work.{break}I've just... never been the peppy kind. Sorry.{break}Hey, so... I'm gonna call it a night, I think.{break}{mood:like}But if you want, you can walk me home. I guess.

{mood:dislike}I'm not mean. I'm just honest.{break}I don't see the point in... pretending I'm having a good time, if I'm not.{break}I'm just being myself.{break}{mood:default}...{break}I should head back home. Night.
{mood:dislike}Maybe I shouldn't have said yes in the first place.

I can't believe Tobin just hangs out here, like... all day.{break}{mood:laugh}I love Tobin as a friend, but I always make him come to MY house to hang out.{break}{mood:dislike}His place is just a bit too... fishy for my likes.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't worry, he knows how I feel!{break}{mood:default}I just can't stand fish. Honestly.{break}My grandpa made me go fishing with him one time.{break}{mood:awkward}He made me HOLD THE FISH.{break}*shudder* So slimy and gross.{break}{mood:sad}I feel sorry for the things...{break}{mood:dislike}...but I also don't want them ANYWHERE NEAR ME.{break}I don't trust anything that spends all its time at the bottom of the sea. Creepy.
It's my birthday today.{break}Not that I really care about birthdays.{break}Please don't treat me differently just because I was born today.
{mood:like}...A birthday gift?{break}For... me?{break}That's really... thoughtful of you.{break}{mood:angry}I'm not crying! I just have wet eyes!

You know what would have been a better birthday gift than this?{break}{mood:dislike}Literally anything. Or better yet, nothing at all.{break}Now I have to spend part of my birthday disposing of this. Thanks.

{mood:happy}Oh, really! I think they're kinda cute.{break}Again, I don't want to TOUCH them, but they eat a lot of pests.{break}{mood:laugh}So they're good for my plants! I can't be mad at them!{break}{mood:happy}Maybe you should just call me next time you've got a spider and I can take it off your hands...{break}{mood:like}Are you ready to head out? I'm starting to get cold.

{mood:default}Yeah, I mean... It's silly, but I feel like fishing is a bit cruel.{break}{mood:sad}They're just having a normal day and then suddenly they get RIPPED out of their homes.{break}{mood:laugh}I know I'd be really upset if someone did that to me.{break}But, I guess in a way, that's kinda what you did, isn't it?{break}I mean, you CHOSE to move away. But you're like a fish that moved tanks.{break}I wonder how long it'll take you to acclimatise.{break}{mood:like}Anyway, are you ready to head out? I'm starting to get cold.

{mood:dislike}I absolutely do not want fish anywhere near my plants.{break}I prefer manure as fertiliser, anyway.{break}Nothing had to die for manure to exist.{break}{mood:sad}I don't like the thought of my flowerbeds being a graveyard...{break}I prefer nurturing life, not ending it.{break}{mood:default}Speaking of ending, I'm going to call it a night.{break}Don't stay up too late.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
It's cool that you grow your own plants.
{mood:awkward}Are you asking... what I think you are?
Have you talked to Paolo today?

...{break}...We can't just sit here in silence the whole time.{break}So... if you're not going to say anything... I will.{break}I've...{break}{mood:dislike}Ugh, why is this so hard to say?!{break}{mood:angry}I'VE REALLY ENJOYED THESE PAST FEW DATES.{break}{mood:default}It's... been... hard for me, I guess. You probably noticed.{break}{mood:like}But you've always stuck around, and that's surprisingly nice.
Do you have the time?{break}Huh. That's later than I thought.
I'm glad you've warmed up to me.
It's my day off.{break}Do you need something?

...Seriously?{break}...{break}...{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry, I just... wow. I don't know how to respond.{break}{mood:love}I mean, it's a yes. Yes!{break}{mood:laugh}But, I just... don't think I've ever... I never imagined that this would happen to me.{break}{mood:love}But yes. I will be your girlfriend.
You don't seem like you're having fun.

Oh, good.{break}Yeah, I would have... hated that.{break}Oh, I just remembered I have to be somewhere.{break}{mood:dislike}And, uh, I have something in my eye. It's just dust.{break}{mood:sad}Don't look at me...
Make sure you water your plants every day.

{mood:laugh}I guess I have. Yeah.{break}{mood:like}I don't know. I didn't... want to? I guess?{break}{mood:default}It's way easier to not let anyone in.{break}{mood:laugh}But you're so persistent!! It's hard not to give in.{break}{mood:happy}Do you want to walk me back to my place?
I'm trying to enjoy my day off.

{mood:laugh}Oh, don't make me push you into the water.{break}No one calls me cute.{break}{mood:default}Maybe you can get a pass though.{break}{mood:angry}JUST NOT IN FRONT OF OTHER PEOPLE. EVER.{break}{mood:laugh}Okay, I know I just yelled at you, but it's really dark...{break}{mood:like}Are you still okay to walk me home?{break}{mood:laugh}I won't yell at you for being nice!
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet

{mood:dislike}I am having fun!{break}{mood:angry}I say what I mean, even if... even if it doesn't look like it.{break}{mood:dislike}I was hoping you'd know me a little better by now.{break}{mood:sad}...Forget I said anything. I need to go home.{break}{npc:right}Bye.
{mood:dislike}Don't you think you're moving a bit fast?
Ofelia isn't working today, if you're looking for her.
So... how are your spirits doing?
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
I saw you fishing the other day.{break}What? That's it.

{mood:angry}I get... SO angry sometimes at the people who caused the cataclysm.{break}They could have built paradise! But they chose... greed and convenience.{break}{mood:sad}But I guess that seems obvious after the fact.{break}Maybe we would have done the same.{break}It's too easy to make mistakes little by little.{break}Like boiling a frog.
You're not seriously breaking up with me like this, are you?
I want to leave the world better than it was before me.
I think there must have been a good reason.
I'm having one of those days where I want to run away and live in the woods.
{mood:dislike}...{break}{mood:angry}I hope you get eaten by something nasty.{break}...{break}{npc:up}{mood:sad}I wish you'd never come here.
I'm making the most of my day off.

{mood:like}I wish everyone was like that.{break}{mood:happy}Imagine what we would be capable of!{break}I know violence isn't the answer, but...{break}{mood:angry}Sometimes I just want to wring a few necks, you know?{break}{mood:dislike}Doing good only gets you so far.{break}{mood:sad}But stopping evil... that's so much harder.{break}{mood:default}I guess that's up to you though, huh?{break}{mood:like}No pressure.{break}I need to get back home now. Sorry.{break}Let's do this again.
{mood:dislike}Not funny. Not cool.{break}You know how hard it was for me to trust you...{break}{mood:sad}Please don't toy with me like this. Ever again.
It's so hard to keep plants happy in weather like this...

I know.{break}People don't usually do terrible, selfish things just... because.{break}But some people's reasoning was just MONEY.{break}{mood:dislike}Those people... I can't forgive them.{break}I want to be a kind and loving person, but some people just do not deserve that.{break}{mood:sad}I just... hope we can be better.{break}{mood:dislike}Ugh, sorry, I've spent the whole date being mad at my ancestors.{break}{mood:default}Let's just call it a night here.{break}Maybe we can do this again. Or whatever.
Please don't pick too many wild plants.{break}They won't grow back if you take them all.

{mood:dislike}Maybe it is childish, but hope is one of the best things that humanity has!{break}No matter how dire the situation, we always have hope. Hope gets us through.{break}So yeah, I'm idealistic, because I KNOW the world can be better.{break}If that's childish, then fine. I don't care.{break}Good night.
So, uh, there are fireworks, apparently.{break}I don't really care either way, but you look a bit lost.{break}So I guess you can watch them with me, if you want. Or whatever.
Okay, I'm going to say something I've been wanting to say to you for a long time.{break}Ahem.{break}{mood:happy}Shots.{break}Shots.{break}SHOTS.{break}{mood:laugh}SHOTS!
I would love to watch them with you, Gaiana.
I'm growing some Yarrow. It's my favourite.
Cool.{break}...{break}{mood:like}I actually do like fireworks. They're pretty cute. And kinda badass, too.{break}All the explosions. Love it.{break}{mood:dislike}Don't tell anyone I said that.
We should grow some heat plants...

{mood:laugh}SHOTS!!{break}{mood:like}Okay, one...two...three...{break}{mood:angry}{npc:down}UGHHH it tastes so nasty. Blegh. Yuck.{break}{mood:like}{npc:up}So... Maybe now both of us can loosen up a little bit.{break}You can be more talkative. And I can maybe let my guard down a bit!{break}{mood:awkward}Or... Or maybe I need to run to the bathroom.
The shop's a lot quieter in winter.{break}That means a lot of time to myself.{break}{mood:happy}Until you inevitably turn up, that is.

Well... yeah! I just figured that it would maybe help both of us.{break}I always feel so tense, and you're always so QUIET.{break}You know what helps loosen people up?{break}{mood:happy}SHOTS! Let's goooo!{break}{npc:down}{mood:angry}Bleeerggggh... that tastes awful.{break}{mood:happy}Ready for another?{break}{mood:awkward}Or... Or maybe I need to run to the bathroom. NOW.
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
I can't wait until it's Sunday.{break}I'm looking forward to going on a long walk.

{mood:dislike}No! Why do people always think that fun things are immature?{break}I had a bad day. I want to enjoy the date.{break}I'm just feeling... stressed.{break}I thought it would be fun to unwind a little.{break}Maybe I'll just unwind on my own instead.{break}{mood:angry}Don't bother walking me home.

{mood:like}Oh, wow. That's... that's a Spirit. Huh.{break}{mood:happy}Okay, this is actually way cooler than I thought. I mean, look at this little guy! I'm going to call it... Alfie.{break}{mood:default}Oh, uh... Lina said I should give you something to say thanks. You can... take one of the plants we sell, if you like.{break}{mood:default}And, uh... thanks.
{mood:dislike}Oh... thanks, but I don't want this one.{break}I asked Zed, and he suggested an Emoshroom. Let me know if you find one.
{mood:dislike}I think I got too drunk last night...

I think I'm going to make this my last drink for the night.{break}I'm getting quite tired.{break}{mood:like}So, uh, I think it was your turn to ask me a question.{break}I feel like I've been grilling you all night.{break}Go on. Ask me anything.{break}{mood:dislike}I mean, nothing weird.
I've been on my feet all day.{break}It feels good to get so much exercise in winter, but...{break}I'm so tiiiiired.
Why did you choose to work with plants?
Oh, you did the thing I asked you to do?{break}Thanks. Uh... Here's some money, I guess.
Why are you so grumpy all the time?
What colour underwear do you have on?

{mood:happy}Oh, good question.{break}{mood:like}I've always been interested in nature, but the idea that nature could be helpful is FASCINATING.{break}There's so much that plants can do for us.{break}I don't have a specialty in medicine like Lina does, but I like to think I can still be useful in my trade.{break}{mood:happy}Plus, I've never been that creative. I guess I'm more into nurturing?{break}{mood:like}I like the way plants take a while to grow... like you have to coax them out of their shell.{break}{mood:laugh}I guess you and I have a lot in common, huh?{break}{mood:like}We both grow things, we both raise things. It's cool.{break}{mood:happy}Come on, let's walk back before it gets too dark.
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met

{mood:sad}...*sigh*{break}Yeah, I guess that's fair.{break}Look... There's part of me that wants to be upset that you asked me that.{break}{mood:default}But you're right. I've been... unfriendly to you.{break}{mood:sad}I don't know why. I'm sorry.{break}Maybe I'm just like this?{break}{mood:default}I hope you'll be patient with me while I figure it out, because... I really am trying to figure it out.{break}{mood:like}It's been a long time since I've wanted to let someone in. I guess that's a good thing?{break}{mood:laugh}I... don't go on a whole lot of dates, so this is pretty new to me.{break}{mood:like}So... shall we walk back before it gets too dark?{break}{mood:laugh}Or before we get too drunk?
...Is that what I think it is?{break}{mood:dislike}You'd better not be joking...

{mood:angry}Are you serious?!{break}{mood:dislike}I mean, you know that's exactly the kind of weird question I meant, right?{break}{npc:up}{mood:dislike}Ossono, cancel that last order. I'm going home.
I'm not. Will you marry me?
It's so warm in here.{break}I get why the plants love it.
Haha, you caught me. Just kidding.

There's something I wanted to say to you, and...{break}I don't know if I have the courage to just... come out with it.{break}...Can I be, uh, honest with you?{break}...{break}Okay, I need to not look at you when I say this.{break}{npc:down}{mood:dislike}I... don't know why you keep being nice to me.{break}I mean... I'm not nice to YOU.
{mood:love}...Seriously? You're serious?{break}I... can't think of anything that would make me happier right now than being your wife.{break}{mood:laugh}That's a yes, by the way.
...I don't have anything to say. Why are you just staring at me?
{mood:dislike}You really don't know me at all if you think that's funny.
Aren't you supposed to be out fixing the world?
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
Why are you looking at me like that?{break}Do you want me to keep talking to you?

....{break}{mood:laugh}Okay, that's adorable.{break}It's not even true!!{break}{mood:like}But... I appreciate the horticultural analogy.{break}I guess I do take longer to warm up to people...{break}{mood:laugh}I don't know why. I'm not a therapist.{break}{mood:like}But I'm really glad that you don't give up easily.{break}{mood:dislike}Don't tell anyone about my soft side or I'll... I'll...{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry. Gotta get out of the habit of threatening people, huh.{break}{mood:like}I think Ossono's closing up. We should head out.
{mood:dislike}Don't waste my time with stupid questions. I'm not ready to get married.
{mood:dislike}Are you going to buy something or what?

{mood:awkward}But why?! I don't understand!{break}{mood:sad}I'm difficult, and sarcastic, and cold. I know I am.{break}I can guess what people say about me behind my back.{break}I can't even be nice around people I WANT to be nice to.{break}I just... I get scared. Of letting people in.{break}{mood:dislike}I know it's stupid.{break}{mood:sad}But... everyone makes it look so easy. And it's not. At least, it's not for me.{break}{npc:right}...Please don't... give up on me. I'm trying. I promise.{break}{mood:default}{npc:up}Oh... I think Ossono's closing up. We should head out.
How do you grow plants so well just out in the open?{break}You must be naturally skilled at horticulture.

{mood:dislike}I'm not mean because I want people to like me.{break}I've always hated when people say that!{break}Like, what are women supposed to do to make people leave them alone?!{break}If we're nice, we're leading people on.{break}If we're mean, we're ALSO leading people on.{break}{npc:down}{mood:angry}Ugh!! I'm leaving.{break}AND I PROMISE IT'S NOT AN INVITATION TO FOLLOW.
Congrats. I hope you don't get divorced any time soon.
It's a bit cold out here in spring.{break}{mood:like}I like it.
{mood:dislike}I am really not in the mood to talk right now.
{mood:love}Let's get out of here. That's not a suggestion. It's a demand, gorgeous.
Thursday is Lina's day off.{break}It's just me today.

I asked Lina what she would do if she was dating someone as... quiet as you.{break}She said that I shouldn't be afraid to fill the silence.{break}But... I'm not used to that? I'm pretty quiet, too.{break}So, uh... yeah...{break}...{break}{npc:up}{mood:dislike}(Why is this so hard, Gaiana?){break}(Just talk to the cute Alchemist. Idiot.){break}{npc:left}{mood:default}Uh, so... being an Alchemist. Must be cool.
It was people like us that ruined the world below, you know.{break}{mood:dislike}I don't understand why they did it.
It's amazing! I'm so glad I took the risk.
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
{mood:dislike}I'm here because I like the quiet. Hint hint.
Oh, it's you again.{break}{mood:dislike}I suppose I should learn to get used to you.
You know I can hear you talking to yourself, right?

Hey... great job with the whole rift thing.{break}I know I can be a hardass, but I genuinely appreciate you saving us all from an uncertain and terrifying fate.{break}{mood:like}I have way too much stuff to do to be turned into soup, or whatever a rift does.
Ossono tells me you're very talkative with everyone. Not just me.

Huh, I never thought of it as a risk, but I guess it is.{break}I mean, you have to leave home and find a new island that you know nothing about.{break}And you have to go out into the wilderness, facing danger...{break}{mood:laugh}I guess my job seems tame in comparison to all that.{break}{mood:like}Honestly, I thought you were a bit of a dweeb when you first got here.{break}{mood:laugh}I mean... no offense, but those clothes are really... something.{break}{mood:like}But you're kinda cool, Alchemist.{break}Who knew.{break}Anyway. I've got to go.{break}See ya.
I can't help you with plant stuff right now.{break}I finished work at 6pm.{break}This is my weekend, now.

Nice.{break}I don't think I could do it.{break}I prefer my day to be a lot more chill. Just me and the plants.{break}{mood:like}But, y'know. I still think it's cool.{break}Getting to see all that biodiversity. Or whatever.{break}Don't forget to bring back some of those seeds for me and Lina, yeah?{break}There's no way either of us are going out there ourselves.{break}I don't know why you're okay with putting yourself in danger, but hey. If it helps, it helps.{break}{mood:default}I just hope you can figure out how to fix the mess we're in.{break}With the Spirits all messed up and angry, I mean.{break}{mood:happy}No pressure.{break}{mood:like}Anyway, I've got to go.{break}See ya.
You made ramen? ...For me?{break}That's... really nice. Thanks. It's my favourite.
You should give your spare seeds to us, by the way.{break}We can propagate them, and then sell those seeds in future.

{mood:awkward}I.... n... no I didn't!{break}{mood:angry}You didn't hear ANYTHING.{break}{mood:dislike}That was just the wind.{break}{mood:angry}{npc:right}Shut up! I'm not blushing!{break}{mood:dislike}I... I have to go.
{mood:dislike}This is a private conversation, do you mind?

Yeah, I bet if someone gave *me* expensive gifts I'd be nicer to them, too.{break}{mood:dislike}What? Why are you looking at me like that??{break}{mood:default}Anyway... I guess you can watch with me... if you want...
{mood:dislike}Can you just... go talk someone else's ear off?{break}I'm trying to relax.

{mood:like}Ossono came over last night and cooked an ENTIRE meal out of plants from my garden.{break}It was incredible! She's so good at cooking.{break}{mood:laugh}Meanwhile, I can't butter bread without breaking a plate.{break}{mood:like}I wonder if I can hire her as my personal chef...
Where do you keep all your tools and whatever?{break}Do you have them with you right now? That's so weird.
Is that what you're looking for in a partner?
Do you just walk up to people and expect them to start talking?{break}That's kinda weird.

I don't really get the hype, to be honest.{break}They're just rocks hurtling through space.{break}I mean, I guess they're pretty. And breathtaking, or whatever.{break}You can watch with me, if you really want.
Why don't you just MARRY her?

{mood:laugh}Oh, wow, are you a little jealous?{break}Don't worry! Ossono and I... no. Nuh uh.{break}{mood:like}She's too chaotic. Not my type at all.{break}{mood:laugh}I love her, but noooo.{break}{mood:love}Maybe I have my eyes on someone else, anyway.{break}{mood:laugh}Oh, wow, look at the time.{break}{mood:like}Way past my bedtime! Time to go!

{mood:laugh}Do I detect a little jealousy, perhaps?{break}{mood:like}Yeah, I would like that.{break}We'd have to wait for all the plants to grow back, though.{break}I mean, Ossono took EVERYTHING I'd grown.{break}{mood:laugh}Ask me again in a month, maybe!{break}{mood:like}Come on, it's getting late. Let's get out before it gets too dark.{break}{mood:like}Oh, and don't worry...{break}{mood:happy}Ossono's not my type.
{mood:dislike}I resent being made to compete like this.{break}If anyone is mean to me about my cooking, I'll push them off the island.
{mood:dislike}Jealousy doesn't suit you, you know.{break}And I don't find it attractive.{break}If you're going to be weird about me hanging out with friends... forget it.{break}Bye.
If you see Lina, don't tell her where I am.

{mood:like}Yeah, I remember the first time I fell in love with plants.{break}I was about...ten, maybe? And I wanted to make a birthday present for my mom.{break}I went through the garden and picked all the pretty flowers, and turned them into perfume.{break}{mood:laugh}Well... "perfume". It was more like "week-old flowers in water".{break}It smelled AWFUL, and it didn't look that good, either.
Ossono's taste-testing a new beer on me.{break}It's... not bad.
I really like that one spirit... what's it called?{break}{mood:like}Emoshroom. I think they're cute.
Ossono keeps telling me about the aurora borealis she saw.{break}{mood:dislike}We don't get those up here. I don't know what she actually saw.
I hope my kids don't turn out like that.
You know, you're the first person to turn up here in... a while.{break}It's taken me a long time to get used to you being here.{break}I guess I don't like change.

{mood:laugh}Oh, she pretended to LOVE it.{break}{mood:like}She even tried wearing it to work.{break}{mood:laugh}It took a week for anyone to tell her she smelled like a compost heap!{break}{mood:like}She's great.{break}Speaking of mom, she's waiting up for me, so I should head out.{break}Walk with me?
{mood:sad}I'm sorry if I snapped at you the other day.{break}I'm still getting used to this...

{mood:happy}I know, right?{break}And I was the CUTEST kid, too. Massive eyes. Tiny ponytails.{break}{mood:laugh}I got away with EVERYTHING.{break}{mood:like}They were good parents, though.{break}{mood:happy}It would be hard to live here if they weren't!{break}{mood:like}Speaking of mom, I said I'd stay at hers tonight, so I should head out.{break}Walk with me?

{mood:dislike}Wow, okay, that's mean.{break}It was cute. She thought it was funny.{break}Kids do stupid things. You're supposed to love them anyway.{break}I hope my kids aren't afraid to be themselves. Or make mistakes.{break}I need to go home now. Goodnight.
Have you caught one of those nasty blobfish yet?{break}{mood:dislike}Ugh, they're so gross.
Do you mind? You're blocking the sun.
